schedule.title: DIP102 - Understanding requirements (Session 1/7)
schedule.description: Study session for Untitled Assignment: Understanding requirements

resource.title: Untitled Assignment
resource.description: You must provide an appropriate context for the speech. (approximately 1000 words) The grading scheme for this assessment is as follow: a.Content: 25% b.

pdfDetails.extractedText:
DIP1ENG01 / DIP102
English in IT
Semester 2, 2025
Assignment No : 2
Release Date : 02/06/2025
Due Date : 02/07/2025
Value : 30% of final total
Assessment Type : Individual Assignment
SECTION A (50 MARKS)
Recommended completion: 30
th
 July 2025
You are required to write an original speech themed ‘Good things come to those who wait’. You must provide an
appropriate context for the speech. (approximately 1000 words)
The grading scheme for this assessment is as follow:
a.Content: 25%
b.Language (grammar and pronunciation): 25%
c.Intonation: 25%
d.Delivery Skills (inclusive of your attire): 25%
SECTION B (30 MARKS)
Recommended completion: 30
th
 July 2025
Adopted from: https://newsnetwork.mayoclinic.org/discussion/covid-19-how-much-protection-do-face-masks-offer-2/
Write a formal email to your employer in response to the issue above. (approximately 200 words)
